eg.syntax

Class SyntaxUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.syntax.SyntaxUtils

  • public class SyntaxUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static variables and methods to search for text elements

      Returns the boolean that is true if an opening brace but not a closing brace is found ahead of the specified position in the case that the specified openingBrace is true or rather if a closing brace or no brace is found in the case that openingBrace is false

    • Method Detail

      • isWord

        public static boolean isWord(java.lang.String text,
                             int pos,
                             int length,
                             char[] nonWordStart)
        Returns the boolean that indicates if the portion of text starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length is a word. A word is defined such that it does not adjoin to a letter or a digit at the start and/or the end.
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        length - the length
        nonWordStart - the array of characters that do not precede, a word, in addition to letters and digits. Can be null Can be null a word. Can be null
        Returns:
        the boolean value

      • isWordStart

        public static boolean isWordStart(java.lang.String text,
                                  int pos,
                                  char[] nonWordStart)
        Returns the boolean that indeicates if the specified position is a word start
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        nonWordStart - the array of characters that do not precede a word, in addition to letters and digits. Can be null
        Returns:
        the boolean value
        See Also:
        isWord(String, int, int, char[])

        public static boolean isWordEnd(java.lang.String text,
                                int pos)
        Returns the boolean that indicates if the character that follows the specified position is word end
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        Returns:
        the boolean value
        See Also:

      • wordLength

        public static int wordLength(java.lang.String text,
                             int pos,
                             char[] endChars)
        Returns the length of a word that starts at the specified position and ends with one of the characters in endChars
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        endChars - the array of characters that mark the end of a word
        Returns:
        the length of the word

      • lastBlockStart

        public static int lastBlockStart(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos,
                                 java.lang.String blockStart,
                                 java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the last block start before the specified position
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the last block start. -1 if a block end is closer than a block start or if no block start is found

      • nextBlockEnd

        public static int nextBlockEnd(java.lang.String text,
                               int pos,
                               java.lang.String blockStart,
                               java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the next block end relative to the specified position
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position in the text
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the next block end. -1 if a block start is closer than a block end or if no block end is found

      • testLastBrace

        public static boolean testLastBrace(java.lang.String text,
                                    int pos,
                                    boolean openingBrace)
        Returns the boolean that is true if an opening brace but not a closing brace is found ahead of the specified position in the case that the specified openingBrace is true or rather if a closing brace or no brace is found in the case that openingBrace is false
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        openingBrace - the boolean that indicates if the last brace must (true) or must not (false) be an opening brace
        Returns:
        the boolean value

                                         int pos,
                                         int length)
        Returns if the section starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length is bordered by double quotes
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        length - the length
        Returns:
        if the section of text starting at pos and spanning length is bordered by double quotes
